TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit RemoteArgument extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 表示一个类型的实例，可跨进程和应用程序域边界传递该实例。

span.span: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用结构将的跨进程之前运行时不确定的类型自变量传递和应用程序域边界。Use the structure to pass arguments of types that are not determined until run time across process and application domain boundaries. 用途是类似于`VARIANT`COM 中的类型The purpose of is similar to that of the `VARIANT` type in COM. 你可以使用来传递以下类型和值作为远程参数：You can use to pass the following types and values as remote arguments: - 。. - 。. - 内部数据类型。Intrinsic data types. - 包含内部数据类型的元素的数组。Arrays that contain elements of intrinsic data types. 内部数据类型是基元数据类型 (即，类型的属性是`true`) 或， ， ，或。An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the property of the type is `true`) or a , , , or . 它支持的类型的每个提供构造函数。 provides constructors for each of the types that it supports. 你还可以使用方法来创建对象。You can also use the methods to create objects. 方法自动调用相应为你的自变量类型的构造函数。The methods automatically call the appropriate constructor for your argument type. 如果你创建使用默认的无参数构造函数，属性设置为值和属性设置为值。If you create a using the default parameterless constructor, the property is set to the value and the property is set to the value .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
